description: Carrots are great to have around for healthy snacks, especially for children, and many of us buy them to make carrot juice But how often do you plan dinner, or part of dinner, around this ingredient?
title: French Grated Carrot Salad
title_page: French Grated Carrot Salad Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Carrots are great to have around for healthy snacks, especially for children, and many of us buy them to make carrot juice. But how often do you plan dinner, or part of dinner, around this ingredient?
Featured in: Carrots: Perfect For Dark Winter Nights.
Learn: How to Make Salad
